Resource Profile: 長期照護管理中心個案服務初篩表/轉介單文件架構

Official URL: http://ltc-ig.fhir.tw/StructureDefinition/LTCCompositionReferral Version: 0.2.0
Active as of 2025-07-28 Computable Name: LTCCompositionReferral

此 Composition 以臺北市長期照顧管理中心個案服務初篩表/轉介單為基礎，用以表述長期照顧管理中心個案服務初篩表/轉介單的文件結構。

Usages:

  • Use this Profile: 長期照顧管理中心個案服務初篩表/轉介單文件打包

cmp-2errorComposition.section, Composition.section:patient, Composition.section:condition-disability, Composition.section:condition-tube, Composition.section:condition-crush, Composition.section:condition-residence, Composition.section:condition-caregiver, Composition.section:condition-problem, Composition.section:condition-need, Composition.section:careplan, Composition.section:questionnaire-adl, Composition.section:questionnaire-iadl, Composition.section:questionnaire-sof, Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver, Composition.section:encounter, Composition.section:practitioner, Composition.section:organizationA section can only have an emptyReason if it is empty
: emptyReason.empty() or entry.empty()
dom-2errorCompositionIf the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT contain nested Resources
: contained.contained.empty()
dom-3errorCompositionIf the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL be referred to from elsewhere in the resource or SHALL refer to the containing resource
: contained.where((('#'+id in (%resource.descendants().reference | %resource.descendants().as(canonical) | %resource.descendants().as(uri) | %resource.descendants().as(url))) or descendants().where(reference = '#').exists() or descendants().where(as(canonical) = '#').exists() or descendants().where(as(canonical) = '#').exists()).not()).trace('unmatched', id).empty()
dom-4errorCompositionIf a resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT have a meta.versionId or a meta.lastUpdated
: contained.meta.versionId.empty() and contained.meta.lastUpdated.empty()
dom-5errorCompositionIf a resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT have a security label
: contained.meta.security.empty()
dom-6best practiceCompositionA resource should have narrative for robust management
: text.`div`.exists()
ele-1error**ALL** elementsAll FHIR elements must have a @value or children
: hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count())
ext-1error**ALL** extensionsMust have either extensions or value[x], not both
: extension.exists() != value.exists()

subject 1..1 Reference(轉介單－個案基本資料) 轉介單描述的個案
reference S 1..1 string 轉介單描述的個案。[應輸入 Patient Resource ID]
Slices for section 16..16 BackboneElement Composition被分成一個或數個小節
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:title
section:patient S 1..1 BackboneElement 個案基本資料
entry 1..1 Reference(轉介單－個案基本資料) 個案基本資料的內容
reference S 1..1 string 個案基本資料的內容。[應輸入 Patient Resource ID]
section:condition-disability S 1..1 BackboneElement 身心障礙手冊
entry 1..* Reference(長期照顧－身心障礙手冊持有狀態 | 長期照顧－身心障礙類型 | TW Core Condition) 身心障礙手冊的內容，至少應填寫是否領有身心障礙手冊，如有領有身心障礙手冊，則續填身障類別與疾病代碼 (ICD-10)，如有多個身障疾病則可放入多個 Condition。
section:condition-tube S 1..1 BackboneElement 管路
entry 1..1 Reference(長期照顧－管路裝設狀況) 管路的內容，至少應填寫是否有管路，如有管路，則續填管路類別，如有多個管路則可放入多個 Condition。
section:condition-crush S 1..1 BackboneElement 壓傷
entry 1..1 Reference(長期照顧－壓傷狀況) 壓傷的內容，至少應填寫是否有壓傷，如有壓傷，則續填壓傷部位、等級與大小。
section:condition-residence S 1..1 BackboneElement 居住狀況
entry 1..1 Reference(長期照顧－居住狀況) 居住狀況的內容，應填寫個案獨居狀態。
section:condition-caregiver S 1..1 BackboneElement 看護
entry 1..1 Reference(長期照顧－看護狀況) 看護的內容，至少應填寫個案是否有看護，如有看護，則續填本國／外國籍看護人力配置狀況。
section:condition-problem S 1..1 BackboneElement 疾病狀況
entry 1..1 Reference(TW Core Condition) 案主(家)主要疾病
section:condition-need S 1..1 BackboneElement 案主(家)主要問題及需求
entry 1..1 Reference(TW Core Condition) 案主(家)主要問題及需求
section:careplan S 1..1 BackboneElement 欲申請服務之種類
entry 1..* Reference(轉介單－服務種類) 欲申請服務之種類
section:questionnaire-adl S 1..1 BackboneElement ADL 失能項目評估
entry 1..1 Reference(轉介單－ADL 失能項目評估問卷回覆) ADL 失能項目評估
section:questionnaire-iadl S 1..1 BackboneElement IADL 失能項目評估
entry 1..1 Reference(轉介單－IADL 失能項目評估問卷回覆) IADL 失能項目評估
section:questionnaire-sof S 1..1 BackboneElement 長者衰弱評估
entry 1..1 Reference(轉介單－衰弱評估問卷回覆) 長者衰弱評估
section:questionnaire-caregiver S 1..1 BackboneElement 照顧者評估
entry 1..1 Reference(轉介單－照顧者問卷回覆) 照顧者評估
section:encounter S 1..1 BackboneElement 出入院情形
entry 1..1 Reference(TW Core Encounter) 個案的出入院情形，若個案在住院中，則填入該次就診資料。
section:practitioner S 1..1 BackboneElement 填表者/轉介者資訊及簽名欄
entry 1..1 Reference(長期照顧－照顧服務提供者 | TW Core Practitioner) 填表者/轉介者資訊及簽名欄
section:organization S 1..1 BackboneElement 填表單位資訊
entry 1..1 Reference(長期照顧－機構 | TW Core Organization) 填表單位資訊

Bindings
Constraints
Obligations
Composition 0..* TWCoreComposition 將一組resources組成一份連貫的臨床聲明，並附有臨床證明。
id Σ 0..1 id 不重複的ID用以識別儲存在特定FHIR Server中的Composition紀錄，通常又稱為邏輯性ID。
meta Σ 0..1 Meta 此Composition Resource的metadata
implicitRules ?!Σ 0..1 uri 創建此內容所依據的一組規則
language 0..1 code 用以表述Composition Resource內容的語言
Binding: CommonLanguages (preferred): 人類語言；鼓勵使用所綁定值集中的代碼，但不強制一定要使用此值集，你也可使用其他值集的代碼或單純以文字表示。
Additional BindingsPurpose
AllLanguages Max Binding

Example Value: zh-TW
text 0..1 Narrative Composition Resource之內容摘要以供人閱讀
This profile does not constrain the narrative in regard to content, language, or traceability to data elements
contained 0..* Resource 內嵌的(contained)、行內的Resources
extension 0..* Extension 擴充的資料項目
modifierExtension ?! 0..* Extension 此擴充的資料項目可能會完全修正或改變其他資料項目的意涵，需特別留意。
identifier SΣ 0..1 Identifier 不分版本的臨床文件架構(Composition)識別碼。
status ?!SΣ 1..1 code registered | partial | preliminary | final | amended | corrected +
Binding: CompositionStatus (required): Composition的工作流程/臨床狀態；應填入所綁定值集中的其中一個代碼。
type S 1..1 CodeableConceptTW Composition的種類（如果可能請使用LOINC）
Binding: LOINC Code Document Type值集 (extensible): 應填入所綁定值集中適合的代碼，確定無適合的代碼才可以使用其他值集的代碼來表示。
category 0..* CodeableConceptTW Composition的分類
Binding: LOINC Document Class值集 (extensible): 應填入所綁定值集中適合的代碼，確定無適合的代碼才可以使用其他值集的代碼來表示。

extension 0..* Extension Additional content defined by implementations
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url

confidentiality Σ 0..1 code 根據特定技術領域的定義
Binding: v3.ConfidentialityClassification (2014-03-26) (required): 應填入所綁定值集中的其中一個代碼。

id 0..1 string Unique id for inter-element referencing
extension 0..* Extension Additional content defined by implementations
modifierExtension ?!Σ 0..* Extension Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
mode 1..1 code personal | professional | legal | official
Binding: CompositionAttestationMode (required): 認證者提供的認證類型；應填入所綁定值集中的其中一個代碼。

period Σ 0..1 Period 文件所涵蓋的時間區間

: text.exists() or entry.exists() or section.exists()
cmp-2errorComposition.section, Composition.section:patient, Composition.section:condition-disability, Composition.section:condition-tube, Composition.section:condition-crush, Composition.section:condition-residence, Composition.section:condition-caregiver, Composition.section:condition-problem, Composition.section:condition-need, Composition.section:careplan, Composition.section:questionnaire-adl, Composition.section:questionnaire-iadl, Composition.section:questionnaire-sof, Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver, Composition.section:encounter, Composition.section:practitioner, Composition.section:organizationA section can only have an emptyReason if it is empty
: emptyReason.empty() or entry.empty()
dom-2errorCompositionIf the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT contain nested Resources
: contained.contained.empty()
dom-3errorCompositionIf the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL be referred to from elsewhere in the resource or SHALL refer to the containing resource
: contained.where((('#'+id in (%resource.descendants().reference | %resource.descendants().as(canonical) | %resource.descendants().as(uri) | %resource.descendants().as(url))) or descendants().where(reference = '#').exists() or descendants().where(as(canonical) = '#').exists() or descendants().where(as(canonical) = '#').exists()).not()).trace('unmatched', id).empty()
dom-4errorCompositionIf a resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT have a meta.versionId or a meta.lastUpdated
: contained.meta.versionId.empty() and contained.meta.lastUpdated.empty()
dom-5errorCompositionIf a resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT have a security label
: contained.meta.security.empty()
dom-6best practiceCompositionA resource should have narrative for robust management
: text.`div`.exists()
ele-1error**ALL** elementsAll FHIR elements must have a @value or children
: hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count())
ext-1error**ALL** extensionsMust have either extensions or value[x], not both
: extension.exists() != value.exists()

IdGradePath(s)DetailsRequirements
cmp-1errorComposition.section, Composition.section:patient, Composition.section:condition-disability, Composition.section:condition-tube, Composition.section:condition-crush, Composition.section:condition-residence, Composition.section:condition-caregiver, Composition.section:condition-problem, Composition.section:condition-need, Composition.section:careplan, Composition.section:questionnaire-adl, Composition.section:questionnaire-iadl, Composition.section:questionnaire-sof, Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver, Composition.section:encounter, Composition.section:practitioner, Composition.section:organizationA section must contain at least one of text, entries, or sub-sections
: text.exists() or entry.exists() or section.exists()
cmp-2errorComposition.section, Composition.section:patient, Composition.section:condition-disability, Composition.section:condition-tube, Composition.section:condition-crush, Composition.section:condition-residence, Composition.section:condition-caregiver, Composition.section:condition-problem, Composition.section:condition-need, Composition.section:careplan, Composition.section:questionnaire-adl, Composition.section:questionnaire-iadl, Composition.section:questionnaire-sof, Composition.section:questionnaire-caregiver, Composition.section:encounter, Composition.section:practitioner, Composition.section:organizationA section can only have an emptyReason if it is empty
: emptyReason.empty() or entry.empty()
dom-2errorCompositionIf the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT contain nested Resources
: contained.contained.empty()
dom-3errorCompositionIf the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL be referred to from elsewhere in the resource or SHALL refer to the containing resource
: contained.where((('#'+id in (%resource.descendants().reference | %resource.descendants().as(canonical) | %resource.descendants().as(uri) | %resource.descendants().as(url))) or descendants().where(reference = '#').exists() or descendants().where(as(canonical) = '#').exists() or descendants().where(as(canonical) = '#').exists()).not()).trace('unmatched', id).empty()
dom-4errorCompositionIf a resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT have a meta.versionId or a meta.lastUpdated
: contained.meta.versionId.empty() and contained.meta.lastUpdated.empty()
dom-5errorCompositionIf a resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT have a security label
: contained.meta.security.empty()
dom-6best practiceCompositionA resource should have narrative for robust management
: text.`div`.exists()
ele-1error**ALL** elementsAll FHIR elements must have a @value or children
: hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count())
ext-1error**ALL** extensionsMust have either extensions or value[x], not both
: extension.exists() != value.exists()

dom-2errorCompositionIf the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT contain nested Resources
: contained.contained.empty()
dom-3errorCompositionIf the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL be referred to from elsewhere in the resource or SHALL refer to the containing resource
: contained.where((('#'+id in (%resource.descendants().reference | %resource.descendants().as(canonical) | %resource.descendants().as(uri) | %resource.descendants().as(url))) or descendants().where(reference = '#').exists() or descendants().where(as(canonical) = '#').exists() or descendants().where(as(canonical) = '#').exists()).not()).trace('unmatched', id).empty()

: contained.meta.versionId.empty() and contained.meta.lastUpdated.empty()

: contained.meta.security.empty()

: text.`div`.exists()

: hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count())
